markdown.markdown:
This website is about my professional journey. You'll also find interesting stories on various topics in **hard** and **cognitive sciences**, and some even more random stuff.

To learn more about me, go to the [About](/about.qmd) page. In [Projects](/projects.qmd), you'll find some work I've contributed to, along with the tech stack I've mastered over the years. For some very random stuff, go to [Blog](/posts.qmd) where you'll find a curated list of stories, articles, and poems. I hope you'll enjoy !


## News

- _01 Aug. 2023_ : I've released version 0.1.5 of Updec: a mesh-free differentiable software for quick experimentation with a variety of PDEs. Install it [here](https://github.com/ddrous/Updec).
- _10 Mar. 2023_ : I gave a talk for CMU Africa on Emerging Graph Neural Network techniques. Find a recording [here](https://youtu.be/ahG-LG0ABRQ).
- _01 Dec. 2022_ : I began my research on AI and HPC for mesh-free simulations. A short abstract can be found [here](http://www.bristol.ac.uk/cdt/interactive-ai/current-students/2021-cohort/nzoyem/).
<!-- - _10 Oct. 2021_ : I moved to Bristol for a PhD in the Interacrive AI CDT. Find pictures of my trips on Instagram. -->


## Selected stories
- a computational theory of the causal mind

## Newsletter
